Hamachi shots were horrible with dry ginger and unfresh fish. Truffle fries lacked taste. Steaks were disappointing - ribeye was overcooked, dry and tasteless. Filet mignon was overcooked with salty sauce. Australian F1 was good. Beet salad lacked flavor. Mac and Cheese was fabulous.
Misoyaki Seabass was delicious and perfectly cooked. Couldn't appreciate the truffle oil on fries.
Snap Pea soup with dungeness crab was amazing. Truffled fries were good. T-Bone steak's flavor was good but not exceptional.
